Name.description: The name of the ObservabilityAccessManager Sink.
Name.markdownDescription:
The name of the ObservabilityAccessManager Sink.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 255  
Pattern: ^[a-zA-Z0-9_.-]+$  
Update requires: Replacement

Policy.description: The policy of this ObservabilityAccessManager Sink.
Policy.markdownDescription:
The policy of this ObservabilityAccessManager Sink.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

Tags.description: Tags to apply to the sink

^(?!aws:.*)[a-zA-Z0-9\\s\\_\\.\\/\\=\\+\.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.
^(?!aws:.*)[a-zA-Z0-9\\s\\_\\.\\/\\=\\+\.markdownDescription:
The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 256  
Pattern: ^(?!aws:.*)[a-zA-Z0-9\s\_\.\/\=\+\-]{0,256}$  
Update requires: No interruption

Tags.markdownDescription:
Tags to apply to the sink

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

Arn.markdownDescription:
